backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing an e-commerce backend with product management (CRUD with categories and stock), shopping cart functionality, COD checkout with shipping details, order tracking with status updates, user profiles, and role-based access control using authorization and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old product and user profile data structures to new versions by adding category/stock fields to products (defaulting to electronics/100) and phone/address/city fields to user profiles (defaulting to 'Not provided').
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: shopping cart system, COD checkout flow, Internet Identity user authentication, and order tracking system, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing components for product display, admin management, cart functionality, checkout flow, order tracking, authentication, and styling with modern blue e-commerce theme.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for consistent design system across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, 'Product Showcase' title, root div for React mounting, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for public catalog, checkout, order management, and admin panel (with guards), wrapped in ThemeProvider and LanguageProvider with page transitions.
Button component for adding products to cart with quantity support, authentication checks, out-of-stock handling, loading states, and internationalization.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: A guard component that checks authentication and admin privileges, displaying loading states, login prompts, or access denied messages before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: A slide-out drawer component that displays cart items with quantity controls, removal options, and a checkout button, including empty state and loading states.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBadge.ts: Displays a colored badge for product categories with localized labels (electronics, clothing, home, books, sports).
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Renders a set of filter buttons for product categories, allowing users to filter by category or view all products.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A footer component displaying copyright information and a "Built with caffeine.ai" attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile navigation, cart button with item count, language toggle, and login button, with conditional rendering for authenticated and admin users.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: A button component that toggles between English and Nepali languages using the language context.
Provides skeleton loading components for product cards and product grids to display during data fetching.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity authentication with login/logout functionality, displaying appropriate icons and loading states.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: A mobile hamburger menu that slides down to show navigation links (products, orders, admin panel) with language toggle and login button.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Displays a colored badge representing order status (pending, processing, shipped, delivered) with localized labels.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: A simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to page content.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product with image, name, description, price, category badge, stock status indicators, and either an add-to-cart button (authenticated users) or WhatsApp contact button (guests).
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive grid layout of ProductCard components, displaying a message when no products are available.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Provides a search input with debounced query handling (300ms delay) and a clear button, triggering the onSearch callback with the current query.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, phone, address, and city; blocks dismissal until profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Button component that opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message expressing interest in a specific product.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides language context (English/Nepali) with localStorage persistence and translation function for UI strings throughout the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Mutation hook for adding items to cart, invalidates cart queries on success and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllOrders.ts: Query hook that fetches all orders from the backend using the actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Query hook that fetches the current user's cart items, enabled only when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: Mutation hook for processing checkout with shipping details, invalidates cart, orders, and products queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateProduct.ts: Mutation hook for creating new products with name, description, price, image, WhatsApp number, category, and stock; invalidates products query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProduct.ts: Mutation hook for deleting products by ID, invalidates products query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the authenticated user's profile, enabled only when actor is ready and user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Custom hook that queries the backend to check if the current authenticated user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useLowStockProducts.t: Custom hook that fetches products with stock levels below a specified threshold using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrder.ts: Custom hook that fetches a single order by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersByStatus.ts: Custom hook that fetches all orders filtered by a specific OrderStatus.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Custom hook that fetches a single product by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Custom hook that fetches all products from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRemoveFromCart.ts: Custom mutation hook that removes a product from the cart and invalidates cart queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Custom mutation hook that saves the current user's profile and invalidates the user profile query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCartQuantity: Custom mutation hook that updates the quantity of a product in the cart and invalidates cart queries on success.
Custom mutation hook that updates an order's status and invalidates related order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProduct.ts: Custom mutation hook that updates product details including name, description, price, image, category, and stock, then invalidates product queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserOrders.ts: Custom hook that fetches all orders for the currently authenticated user.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind configuration, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes with an e-commerce color palette, typography styles, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrderDetails.tsx: Admin page displaying detailed order information with the ability to update order status through a dropdown selector.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin page showing a filterable list of all orders with status badges, allowing navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing products with a table view showing product details, stock alerts, and actions to create, edit, or delete products. Includes navigation to order management and displays low-stock warnings.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page with a form for shipping details (name, phone, address, city) and an order summary displaying cart items and total. Submits order and redirects to order confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/CreateProduct.tsx: Product creation form for admins with fields for name, description, price, WhatsApp number, category, stock, and image upload. Handles image preview and upload progress before submitting to backend.
frontend/src/pages/EditProduct.tsx: Product editing form that loads existing product data and allows admins to update all product fields including optional image replacement. Preserves existing image if no new file is uploaded.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrders.tsx: User order history page displaying a list of orders with order ID, status badge, item count, and total price. Each order is clickable to view details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation success page showing order ID, estimated delivery time, and action buttons to view order details or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetails.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific order including order ID, total, status badge, shipping details (name, phone, address), and ordered items with images and prices. Uses React Router for navigation and includes loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/PublicCatalog.tsx: Main product catalog page with hero banner, search functionality, category filtering, and product grid display. Implements responsive design with different hero images for mobile/desktop and handles loading/error/empty states.
frontend/src/translations/translations.t: Empty translation file kept for reference; actual translations are now managed in LanguageContext for better performance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography, container queries, animations (accordion, fade-in), custom shadows (soft, elegant), and responsive breakpoints.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a mobile-first e-commerce app for Nepal with cash-on-delivery, dual user roles (customer/admin), shopping cart, order tracking, multi-language support, and lists existing features with requirement IDs.
